# vpsie_domain (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vpsie_domain" "example" {
  domain_name        = "example.com"
  project_identifier = "project-identifier"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `domain_name` (String)
- `project_identifier` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_on` (String)
- `identifier` (String)
- `last_check` (String)
- `ns_validated` (Number)
